text:
These look great! I like that there are many options per round. Could we specify that small groups don’t have to address ALL questions, rather pick among the group which ones to focus on? Just worried that groups will be overwhelmed and rush through to try to get to all of the questions in a short period of time. 

Also my vote is to drop the closing question in favour of focusing on the challenge poll, just in the interest of time
